title: Your account and it's worth.
body: I was just curious if there was any simple way to see what your league of legends account would be worth, (As in how much money you've put into the game) I feel like that would be something other players and myself would rather enjoy being able to see.

replies.body:
There definitely is, check this page out:
privacy.riotgames.com

It also gives you some other really handy stats too.
The site worked a charm, thanks heaps man.
Almost cried seeing I've spent 4755$ on the game though...
I believe if you send in a support ticket yhey will reply with the exact amount you have spent.
I don't mean I want to sell my account, I'm just really curious as to how much money I've spent on it.,
I believe your account to you is worth nothing because, riot own the account. (I'm putting it simply before you get a 500 word from loads of people who are just going to say this)
